description: Manny is back for some more action, and this time Brodie shows him the ropes! Manny just couldn’t wait to work with one of our best, especially knowing Brodie is an all-around nice guy and, more importantly, a rough top. “Manny, how do you wanna be fucked today?” Before he could mutter a response, Brodie answered for him, “Hard, deep, and fast”. Manny wasn’t opposed to that, and Brodie definitely stayed true to his word. When it came down to business, he gave it to Manny really good, to a point where Manny blew such a huge load that surprised everyone!
title: Brodie & Manny: Bareback
